info.name: Bao Viet Holdings
info.description: Bao Viet Holdings, through its subsidiaries, engages in insurance, financial, and real estate activities in Vietnam. The company offers whole life, endowment, death, mixed, bank-linked, periodic payment, joint, health and personal accident, property and damage, cargo, hull and shipowner liability, general liability, aviation, motor vehicle, fire and explosion, and agricultural insurance, as well as other types of life and non-life insurance; and reinsurance for all life and non-life operations. It also provides fund management, portfolio management, securities brokerage and trading, investment consulting, brokerage, securities underwriting, securities custody, securities investment consulting, financial consulting, and securities trading services. In addition, the company offers constructing and leasing services for real estate, as well as offers related services. The company was founded in 1965 and is headquartered in Hanoi, Vietnam.
